text: Overall the hostel was great and nice, if a little spartan, but the bathroom could have been nicer and cleaner (you had to hold the shower head yourself and small doesn't even begin to describe the size of the shower) and the only other problem was that there were some REALLY noisy guys in the room down the hall, and the walls were really thin, so they kept waking us up, but that wasn't the hostel's fault.  The location was awesome and I would totally stay there again.

There is free internet computer, near the metro, the breakfast is so good and the person in the reception give a lot of attention to our questions.
If I go one more time to brussels, the only thing that is sure is that I will rest in this hotel!
My main criteria for choosing a hostel are location, security and cleanliness and it served adequately in all departments. No complaints and recommend it.
IT WAS REALLY GOOD CRAIC THERE, BUT THAT HAD MORE TO DO WITH THE PEOPLE WE MET THERE THAN THE HOSTEL, ITS STILL A VERY GOOD PLACE THOUGH.
hostel: Le Montclair Montmartre Hostel & Budget Hotel

text: It was only a couple of blocks away from the river and Eiffel Tower- I loved it! The room was very charming (a little to purple, but very charming)
Very friendly staff, very clean. Nice breakfast buffet included. Not located centrally, but fairly easy to get to by public transport.
The staff here were really nice. When I arrived they even gave me some home grown fruit! I would definetly stay here again!
the rooms were a bit small but everything else was great. I loved the french doors on the windows!
A very good place to stay, was very pleased with the  place. It was clean and the staff was very friendly.
A very nice B&B in a somewhat shady part of town.  Very close to the train station.
We got the feeling the place was in mid renovation - unfirtunately our room had not been done yet and the next room was being gutted.
No customer comment

This Hotel was amazing.  It was a great location, great price, fairly clean.  The staff was the best part!  They were amazing.  We had a little problem with one of the atms and had to get ahold of our bank outside of the country and the receptionist was so helpful and understanding, as it was quite an emergency, anyway, they were really great and very helpful.  We really enjoyed our stay here, you really get more then what you pay for.  I definitely recommend this hotel and would stay again!
  Thanks again to the staff for all of your help!!!

This hostel was BRUTAL!!!  The directions from the bus station were awful!  We arrived late at night and had a hell of a time locating it, even though we were on the street that it was supposedly on!!!  Luckily half an hour later we found a little sticker that said 4 Fun on it which was put below the buzzer.  The staff was nice, but the hostel was dirty and smelt of garbage.  Unfortunately I cannot recommend this hostel AT ALL

I am 64 years of age so staying in a hostel with my son might have been a challenge. Nothing could be further from the truth! We had the most fantastic stay. This place is really great, clean, roomy with all great facilities. Took advantage of the free bike hire and Barcelona is a wonderful city to see by bike, with many safe bike lanes!

The hostel is near a real gem, the old bull ring. This is a must visit place.

Massive thanks to all the staff who made it a wonderful 3 day stay!!!

What a fabulous place. Right near the station.
Gionvanni. the owner  is an absolute one off. WHAT A STAR She really made our holiday. If you get the chance stay there. You won't be sorry.
Tell her Roger sent you (I'm not on commission!!!)
You are never too old to stay at hostelworld!
This place is a dive and we were greeted by drunk, stoned staff.  Do not go.
Good breakfast.  Good price.  Good location
No real kitchen.  Good internet available.  Good showers.  Not too hard to get downtown from here.   Manager was very friendly.
hostel: The Prescott International Hotel and Hostel

text: No kitchen, no laundry.
Fantastic breakfast included - probably the best one in the last five months.
Lovely breakfast.  Takes awhile to get into the centre by tram.  No cooking facilities or fridge available.  Good showers.
Ten minute walk to the major museums!
The walk up the hill is hard work, especially with a back pack.

I just Want to say that my friends and I love the place ! The atmosphere , the staff were excellent , they made us feel very comfortable ! And very helpful when it came to help us getting into places !! !  Very clean place , we definitely recommend 100 %
it was ok, but as we take an apartment the direcction changes, and for breakfast we have to go to another place.

bises a Johanna

guillaume
Place was fine. nice staff, but wish I had known there would be an extra charge for checking in late
No further comments necessary
No further comments
As this was my second time in a hostel, I am not sure my ratings are accurate.  The hostel I stayed in while in Paris was better than this one.  Sorry, but I need to be honest.

Staff was fantastic. I had a great stay. You might consider having MTA and Blue Bus Schedules handy. 
I will definitely be back

Ray
No customer comment
not a total party animal hostel, but we still had a great time!  its nice and close to the train station, metro, grocery and pretty much everything else that you will need.
Great hostel in Beijing! Clean, and friendly, with good prices for food included. A real relaxing place to get away from the hustle of Beijing, especially since i speak no Chinese!
hostel: Sitting On The City Walls Courtyard House

text: No customer comment
Fantastic Hostel. Just like being at home.  Brendan and Danni are brilliant.  Paros is a fantastic Island.
Loved this place. Amazing, friendly, helpful staff with all knowledge of all local info. Will stay again when I visit Sorrento!
No customer comment
hostel: HI Chicago, The J.Ira & Nicki Harris Family Hostel

text: No customer comment

Downtown hostel rocks.  its clean and safe. Best thing though it's the bar of the hostel where you can easily meet other people.  The only thing that I did not like is that when I payed for my stay with my credit card, I had to pay a small additional fee like 5 coroners... First time I see that :-(
Generally highly recommended !
I stayed in a four person mixed shared room. The hostel was clean and tidy and actually looks like a hotel. The strong point of this hostel is its great location , although it could be a bit cheaper

Extremely rude staff.  Impersonal.  Do not recommend.  Claim to have free internet; free internet really consists of 15 minutes of free internet.  Location is ok, however, rudeness of staff makes everything else worse.
